testcase.name: rearVideoRec
testcase.system-out: Test: Start  Test10 Scenario is as follows 1.Launch Camera application and start rear camera video recording for all host applicable resolutions in uSD Card 2.Playback Highest resolution recorded video from USD Card, fast forward playback and pause video scenario 3.Playback copied videos from Test1 folder, fast forward and pause scenario Setting up the appium desired capabilities  Launch home screen Launch appium permission access pop-up No permission access pop-up found Launching settings application and set external storage as storage option for video recording. Select About phone Select storage option Select storage settings Select camera option Select storage as external storage Launch Camera application for rear camera video recording No location permission access pop-up found: org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters. Click on first file to play highest recorded resolution video file Started video playback Tap Somewhere on Screen for contents to visible on Screen Fast forward video for 10 seconds Pass: Recorded
